title: Fix CharType min and max values
body_html: CharType is int8_t and this is not same as char. CHAR_MIN and CHAR_MAX cannot be used reliably to specify min and max values for int8_t. Using CHAR_MIN/MAX breaks some functions when used on a platform where the char type is unsigned (0-255 value) such as PowerPC and ARM.
body_text: CharType is int8_t and this is not same as char. CHAR_MIN and CHAR_MAX cannot be used reliably to specify min and max values for int8_t. Using CHAR_MIN/MAX breaks some functions when used on a platform where the char type is unsigned (0-255 value) such as PowerPC and ARM.
body: CharType is int8_t and this is not same as char. CHAR_MIN and CHAR_MAX cannot be used reliably to specify min and max values for int8_t. Using CHAR_MIN/MAX breaks some functions when used on a platform where the char type is unsigned (0-255 value) such as PowerPC and ARM.
